content: the emotional support chickens that swept through the fiber community last year clearly left their mark on me i was smitten wanting a version of my own in tunisian crochet i used the original knit design as inspiration and adapted it with this result a whimsical textured bird that s full of personality and charm this little chick features a distinctive fan-like tail section that s both fun to make and delightfully eye-catching perfect for gift giving or just brightening up your craft space each fancy fowl is a joy to create from start to finish skill level intermediate finished size approximately 7 18 cm long × 6 15 cm tall tag your photos with *#fancyfowltc* so everyone can admire your flock
